statements: DELETE FROM satellite_images WHERE sensor_type = 'Infrared' AND acquisition_date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM satellite_images WHERE acquisition_date < '2022-01-01' AND sensor_type = 'Landsat';
DELETE FROM satellite_images WHERE image_id = 10 AND resolution = 'High'
DELETE FROM image_properties WHERE property_id = 5 AND image_id IN (SELECT image_id FROM satellite_images WHERE sensor_type = 'Infrared')
DELETE FROM image_tags WHERE tag_name = 'mountain' AND image_id = 100;
DELETE FROM image_metadata WHERE metadata_key = 'location' AND metadata_value = 'forest';
